title: (x) Product (RED) AIDS benefit campaign - Trade Gothic Cond {Kyle Jones}
content:
the AIDS benefit campaign, in all the Gap stores now. type?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140428150455im_/http:/typophile.com/files/inspired_4078.800.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140428150455im_/http:/typophile.com/files/required_5640.800.gif)
author: swiss dots

comments.content: Textbook example of Trade Gothic Bold Condensed. I love this font, so hopefully it doesn't get generally associated with the (RED) font
